name: Undertale Last Breath Phase3 (My Take)
description:
Rules:

Press Green Flag to Play; Press it Twice to Restart

Arrow Keys to Move

Don't Move During Blue Attacks

Move During Orange Attacks

Avoid ALL White Attacks

When HP Is 0 You Die

To Interact And Move Through Dialogue Press Z 

Press Down Arrow To Go To FIGHT, ACT, ITEM, MERCY Buttons

If you press "C" you will turn on cheats and show your hitbox, and if you press "H" you will activate inf. HP, granted this only works if cheats are already turned ON. If you press "V" you will hid your hitbox, set HP to normal and turn off cheats! :-)

Mild Epilepsy Warning! ( If you have epilepsy pls don't play!!!!!!!!)

If things seem slow, laggy, or the animations are broken its not the code its lag or its your computer.

 |

 \/

Gaster Blasters By: @DaBestMarioPlayer

Soul By: @Catermelon

The game is difficult yes but it is possible! I don't know if its no-hittable but if someone can do it and send me proof (that isn't spliced or faked) then I'll (no cap) give you 5$ not even kidding, just as long as I see it lol! So have fun!! Unfortunately there's no mobile support but if the comments want it I'll try and add it! :-)

P.S. I am a furry! So we CAN do cool stuff, BRIAN!!!
